Name: Citrus Caipirovska
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE lemon in base of glass. Add other ingredients and fill glass with crushed ice. CHURN drink with bar spoon and serve with short straws.
Review: Superbly refreshing balance of sweet and citrus sourness.
